info.title: Move2Kube API
info.description:
This is a documentation of the Move2Kube REST API.
All API calls expect the `Authorization: Bearer <access-token>` HTTP header unless specified otherwise.
The access token can be obtained in the same way as OAuth 2.0 using the token endpoint in the admin section.

tags.name: move2kube
tags.description: Helps migrate your app to Kubernetes.

post.summary: Get an access token using client ID and client secret (for use with trusted clients).
post.description: Get an access token using client ID and client secret (for use with trusted clients).

requestBody.description:
Use `grant_type=client_credentials` in the body and set the header  
`Authorization: Basic base64(client_id + ":" + client_secret)`

403.description: Don't have authorization to get the access token.

get.summary: Returns some support information like CLI, API and UI version info.
get.description: Returns some support information like CLI, API and UI version info.

cli_version.description: The version, commit hash, etc. of the Move2Kube CLI tool being used.
cli_version.example:
version: v0.3.0+unreleased
gitCommit: 0ccc6c4c6ea8ccd8fb8f999d37f81cdf0fdf22e6
gitTreeState: clean
goVersion: go1.18.1
platform: darwin/amd64

api_version.description: The version, commit hash, etc. of the Move2Kube API server being used.
api_version.example:
version: v0.1.0+unreleased
gitCommit: d21d2503e136fd85d5b166d5899d4058083cf0ce
gitTreeState: clean
goVersion: go1.18.1
platform: darwin/amd64

ui_version.description: The version, commit hash, etc. of the Move2Kube UI website being used.

docker.description: Whether the docker socket '/var/run/docker.sock' is mounted when running as a container.

get.summary: Get all the workspaces you have access to.
get.description: Get all the workspaces you have access to.

403.description: Don't have authorization to get all the workspaces.

post.summary: Create a new workspace. The ID will be generated by the server.
post.description: Create a new workspace. The ID will be generated by the server.

requestBody.description:
The metadata of the workspace.
Leave the ID blank, it will be generated.
Leave the projects blank, projects are managed through a different set of endpoints.

get.summary: Get the workspace with the given ID.
get.description: Get the workspace with the given ID.

parameters.name: workspace-id
parameters.description: ID of the workspace to get.

403.description: Don't have authorization to get this workspace.

put.summary: Update a workspace. The workspace will be created if it doesn't exist.
put.description: Update a workspace. The workspace will be created if it doesn't exist.

parameters.name: workspace-id
parameters.description: ID of the workspace to update.

requestBody.description:
The metadata of the workspace.
Leave the ID blank, it will be generated.
Leave the projects blank, projects are managed through a different set of endpoints.

get.summary: Get all the roles for the given user.
get.description: Get all the roles for the given user.

parameters.name: idp-id
parameters.description: ID of the identity provider.

parameters.name: user-id
parameters.description: ID of the user as given by the identity provider.

schema.description: List of role IDs assigned to the user.

403.description: Don't have authorization to get the roles for this user.

patch.summary: Update the roles of the given user.
patch.description: Update the roles of the given user.

parameters.name: idp-id
parameters.description: ID of the identity provider.

parameters.name: user-id
parameters.description: ID of the user as given by the identity provider.

requestBody.description: Add, remove or overwrite the roles of the user.

op.description:
add: add these roles to the existing roles the user has.  
remove: remove these roles from the existing roles the user has.  
overwrite: completely overwrite the existing roles the user has with these roles.

403.description: Don't have authorization to update the roles for this user.

put.summary: Add a role to a user.
put.description: Add a role to a user.

parameters.name: idp-id
parameters.description: ID of the identity provider.

parameters.name: user-id
parameters.description: ID of the user as given by the identity provider.

parameters.name: role-id
parameters.description: ID of the role to add to the user.

403.description: Don't have authorization to add this role to this user.

delete.summary: Remove a role from a user.
delete.description: Remove a role from a user.

parameters.name: idp-id
parameters.description: ID of the identity provider.

parameters.name: user-id
parameters.description: ID of the user as given by the identity provider.

parameters.name: role-id
parameters.description: ID of the role to remove from the user.

403.description: Don't have authorization to remove this role from this user.

UnauthorizedError.description: Authorization header is missing or invalid.

description.example: failed to create the workspace. Error: ...

id.description: A unique ID for the project.

name.description: A human readable name for the project.

description.example: This is one of the projects that team 1 is working on.

id.description: A unique ID for the workspace.

name.description: A human readable name for the workspace.

description.example: This is the workspace for all the projects of team 1.

Resource.description: A resource is a URL path.

id.description: A unique ID for the role.

name.description: A human readable name for the role.

rules.description: The list of rules to apply for this role.

resources.description:
List of resources. The elements of this list are Javascript ES6 Regex patterns.
When a request for a protected resource is received these regexs are used to
match against the resource URL.

verbs.description:
List of allowed verbs.  
For now the only supported verb is `all` which allows all actions on the resource.

items.description: A rule is a list of resources and the list of allowed verbs for those resources.
